snippet: ROMANO--Salvatore. Artist, born in Cliffside, New Jersey died September 18, 2015 at 90. For five decades his work has been exhibited in New York galleries in Soho and Chelsea, and his art has been shown in Brazil and Italy. He resided in Soho with his wife of 50 years Corinne Robins. He is survived by his daughter Joyce Romano. There will be a memorial for friends and colleagues to celebrate his life and art, on May 7th at Cooper Union Rose Auditorium at 3pm. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ROMANO--Salvatore. Artist, born in Cliffside, New Jersey died September 18, 2015 at 90. For five decades his work has been exhibited in New York galleries in Soho and Chelsea, and his art has been shown in Brazil and Italy. He resided in Soho with his wife of 50 years Corinne Robins. He is survived by his daughter Joyce Romano. There will be a memorial for friends and colleagues to celebrate his life and art, on May 7th at Cooper Union Rose Auditorium at 3pm. 1/3
